Don't Fear the Internet(s)

 13 Oct 2011
8
Guest: Test Episode
Hosts: Garth Braithwaite and Leif Wells
Producer: Brad Feuerstein
Pause Play
00:00
88:88
100%
Download the episode

Joined by Jessica Hishe and Russ Maschmeyer about Don't Fear the Internet, a project to help educate the masses.

Jessica discusses another new project of hers, Inker Linker, and Russ talks briefly about finishing up the MFA in Interaction Design at the School of Visual Arts in New York, and his new job at Facebook.

We nerd out a bit on new TV shows afterwards.
